name: Naro
overview: Naro is an fast growing and dynamic IT company in Greece offering a variety of services-namely: hosting, web pages, SEO & web marketing. Naro also created a news search engine called “Naro.gr”. The latter, is gathering news & articles from 15.000 greek sites and blogs and automatically categorizes them, according to your criteria of interest (e.g. car, world news, business news etc).
